stories.title: Final one-dayer washed out
stories.subTitle: South Africa v Bangladesh, 3rd ODI, East London
stories.summary: The final one-day international between South Africa and Bangladesh at East London has been washed out

stories.title: Bangladesh aim for consolation win
stories.subTitle: South Africa v Bangladesh, 3rd ODI, East London
stories.summary: Though Bangladesh have already lost the series after defeats in the first two games, their captain Mohammad Ashraful has said the third and final ODI will be just as important as the previous matches
